document.full_text: one person died and more than 30 others were injured in the kenyan capital sunday when an explosion in a hardware shop sparked a blaze at a neighboring petrol station, police said.
document.title: one killed in kenya blast, over 30 injured
lines_and_colors: one person died and more than 30 others were injured in the kenyan capital sunday when an explosion in a hardware shop sparked a blaze at a neighboring petrol station, police said.
